Package com.martinkl.warc

Common implementation of reading and writing files in WARC format.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WARCFileReader
    Reads WARCRecords from a WARC file, using Hadoop’s filesystem APIs.
    WARCFileWriter
    Writes WARCRecords to a WARC file, using Hadoop’s filesystem APIs.
    WARCRecord
    Immutable implementation of a record in a WARC file.
    WARCRecord.Header
    Contains the parsed headers of a WARCRecord.
    WARCWritable
    A mutable wrapper around a WARCRecord implementing the Hadoop Writable interface.

Package com.martinkl.warc Description

Common implementation of reading and writing files in WARC format. This package depends only on generic Hadoop libraries, but not on any particular version of MapReduce.
